## CssClassesBasicDialogPopup interface

Css classes for basic dialog popup

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CssClassesBasicDialogPopup 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [optionChecked](./grid-material.cssclassesbasicdialogpopup.optionchecked.md) | <code>string</code> | Css class used as icons indicating that option is selected (only when multiple) |
|  [optionItemDiv](./grid-material.cssclassesbasicdialogpopup.optionitemdiv.md) | <code>string</code> | Css class applied to each option div |
|  [optionItemTextDiv](./grid-material.cssclassesbasicdialogpopup.optionitemtextdiv.md) | <code>string</code> | Css class applied to each option text div |
